abstract.para: From the OPAC home, you can conduct a basic search of all materials owned by all libraries in your Evergreen system.

This search can be as simple as typing keywords into the search and box and clicking Go! Or, you can make your search more precise by limiting your search by fields to search, material type or library location.

itemizedlist.listitem: Keyword – terms found anywhere in the item description
Title – terms found in the item title
Subject – terms found in the formal subject designation
Audiobooks – on CD, cassette, MP3, etc.

step.para: Open an Internet browser and go to the Evergreen search page.

In the search box, enter your search term
Select an index or format if applicable
Click Choose a library to search and select a library from the list if desired
